com.interface21.web.context
Class ContextLoader

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.interface21.web.context.ContextLoader
public class ContextLoader
extends java.lang.Object

Performs the actual initialization work for the root application context. Called by ContextLoaderListener.

Regards a "contextClass" parameter at the servlet context resp. web.xml root level, falling back to the default context class (XmlWebApplicationContext) if not found.

Since:
17.02.2003
Author:
Juergen Hoeller
See Also:
ContextLoaderListener, XmlWebApplicationContext
